body.p: The ∏ Help Browser provides quick online help on the Smalltalk language, the development environment, the coding tools, some of the basic class libraries, and add-on components.

The Help topics can guide your understanding of concepts (e.g., "how are variables scoped in Smalltalk?"), tasks (e.g., "how do I create a class?"), as well as the class library ("which classes are best for sorting lists?"), and add-on components ("which add-on frameworks provide support for HTTP?"). Detailed descriptions of the development tools and their menus are available, as are some best practices for using the ∏ environment, and many code examples to illustrate use of the class library.
For more complete documentation, refer to the ∏ documentation set.
